name: SRD: Super Real Darwin
summary: SRD: Super Real Darwin is a 1987 vertical scrolling shooter arcade game developed and published by Data East. It is the sequel to Data East's 1986 arcade game, Darwin 4078. The player takes control of a small fighter ship capable of mutating into different shapes. The ship's appearance will change with upgraded weapons as the player obtain more power-ups.

name: Srq
summary: Sqr is a colourful mathematical puzzle. The player's point is to make each line's digit sum equal to appropriate column's sum using addition(+) and substraction(-) operation only.

name: S.R.D. Mission
summary: A space shooter where you attempt to rescue astronauts.

name: SRS: Street Racing Syndicate
summary: Every night, in cities like LA, Philly, and Miami, crews of import tuners push their nitrous-injected obsessions to the limit. Whether in under- ground or sanctioned races, on the track or through the wide open city streets, high speeds bring high risks. And serious rush. In the Street Racing Syndicate, choose your races carefully. Your opponent could have more under the hood than it seems. Consider this your initiation into the underground world of street racing.

name: S-Race
summary: A game for the Game Master handheld

name: SRC: Sprint Robot Championship
summary: SRC is a science fiction racing game which combines sprint racing with parkour obstacle running. With no speed limit, players attempt to achieve the fastest lap times possible. Players race across a wide range of tracks, each one offers a unique challenge to test players skills.

name: Sram
summary: Sram is a textual adventure with graphics for the Amstrad CPC.

name: SRX
summary:
SRX is an arcade drone racing game in which the player handles all types of miniature flying vehicles.
Players operate in multiple environments made up of objects and characters frozen in time, featuring their own story. Outside the races, they will be able to freely explore the scenes and find hidden treasures.

name: SRX: The Game
summary: Do you have what it takes to compete with the best of the best in the Superstar Racing Experience? SRX: The Game is your chance to prove it.

name: Sr. Empatia
summary: Já teve um rage jogando um jogo de puzzle? Gostaria de ter? Entre no mundo divertido de Sr. Empatia e desfrute de metáforas e puzzles neste jogo 3D/2D.

name: Srok Godnosti
summary: Srok Godnosti is an atmospheric adventure game set in the post-USSR setting. In the role of a district police officer, you will have to serve in a small town lost in time. The fate and lives of city residents will depend on your actions.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #2
summary: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 2 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 6 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #1
summary: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 1 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 6 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #3
summary: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 3 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 6 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: SRG Mixtape Volume #4
summary: Super Rare Mixtape Vol. 4 is a physical indie game collection including 30 games and 10 demos. Packaged as a USB drive shaped like cassette tape with only a limited number sold.

name: Srogue
summary: Srogue is a snake roguelite where you play as a snake and defeat enemies in order to feast and grow. Unlock new ways to play by gaining experience and choosing items to alter your snake. The goal is to survive as long as possible.

name: S.R.A
summary: S.R.A Project is a challenging roguelike bullet hell wave survival game. Face cosmic creatures, improve through skill and perseverance, and master a world that rewards learning and adaptation.

name: Srush
summary: 2D Roguelike Pull-Action Game. Simply pull and fire slimes with your mouse! Attack by slamming slimes into enemies! Grow your slimes, build your strategy, and defeat invading enemies to protect your nest!
